text: CLOSE According to New York City mayor Bill de Blasio, at least 8 people have died and several others have been injured after a motorist drove a truck into a Lower Manhattan bike path. USA TODAY Celebrities are sending their love and support to New York on social media following a terror attack that left eight people dead Tuesday when a truck plowed down pedestrians on a bicycle path near the World Trade Center in Lower Manhattan. Josh Groban, Lin - Manuel Miranda, Mariah Carey, Sam Smith joined other celebs on social media to show support following the NYC terror attack.
